name: Traffic Controller
description:
You have been tasked with a hard job of controlling traffic. More cars will start coming so be prepared to guide them fast.

If you make any cars collide, you lose.

If there are 100 or more cars on the level, you lose.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls

W, S, A, D and arrow keys to toggle traffic directions (up, down, left, right).

Zoom in and out with + and - keys.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game was made for Weekly Game Jam - Week 96.

Theme: Traffic Jam

Made in less than 2 days, may be buggy.
